metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35530 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In LibRaw, there is an out-of-bounds write vulnerability within the"new_node()" function (libraw\src\x3f\x3f_utils_patched.cpp) that can betriggered via a crafted X3F file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35530` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.4
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libraw package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-1ubuntu0.4').
ufraw package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
digikam package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
